invite.content: Invite me to your server with this link: [Invite](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id={client}&scope=bot%20applications.commands&permissions=8)

convert.description: Converts units of measurement or currencies

dictionary.description: Provides definitions for a given word in a specified language

imagine.description: Creates an image from a prompt

options.numoutputs: The number of outputs to generate

translate.description: Translates text from one language to another

options.targetlanguage: The target language code (e.g., 'es' for Spanish)

closethread.description: Closes the current thread, removes tags, applies the 'resolved' tag, and archives the thread.
closethread.forumchannel: This command can only be used in a thread within a forum channel.
closethread.allowedforumchannels: This command cannot be used in this forum channel.
closethread.resolved: This command cannot be used in this forum channel.

embed.title: Thread Closed
embed.description: Thread **`{threadName}`** has been closed and archived.

errorembed.title: Error
errorembed.description: n error occurred while closing the thread: {error}
